backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing products, orders, user profiles with phone verification, and access control.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles with custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML document mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/api/adminProductHooks.ts: React Query hooks for admin product CRUD and publish status with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/api/authHooks.ts: React Query hook to check if the caller is an admin.
Hooks for requesting, verifying, and checking phone verification with sanitized errors.
frontend/src/api/queryKeys.ts: Centralized React Query key definitions for products, orders, admin, profiles, and verification.
frontend/src/api/shopHooks.ts: Storefront hooks for fetching products, creating orders, and initializing the shop with sanitized errors.
frontend/src/api/userProfileHooks.ts: Provides React Query hooks to fetch and save the caller's user profile with authentication checks and error sanitization.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps the app in CartProvider with shared layout.
frontend/src/components/checkout/OrderSu: Displays a list of cart items with prices and shows the subtotal for checkout.
frontend/src/components/feedback/AccessD: Renders an access denied message with an icon and a button to return home.
frontend/src/components/feedback/AsyncSt: Handles loading, error, and empty UI states with sanitization for errors and optional retry logic.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Renders the site footer with brand info, quick links, contact details, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Displays the site header with navigation, cart button, mobile menu, and optional admin link.
frontend/src/components/products/Product: Shows a product card with image handling, details, price, stock, and add‑to‑cart functionality.
Formats a product description into key‑value lines or paragraphs for display.
Displays a responsive grid of product cards or an empty state.
Provides an image gallery with error handling, thumbnail selection, and fallbacks for missing images.
Search bar component with text input and category filter using Select UI elements.
frontend/src/content/siteContent.ts: Central config defining site marketing copy, navigation labels, and static content types.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity login state, stored identities, and auth client setup.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining color variables, light/dark themes, and base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry that mounts React, sets up React Query and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutContactPage.tsx: Renders About and Contact sections using site content with styled cards and attribution.
frontend/src/pages/AdminProductsPage.tsx: Admin interface to view, create, edit, and publish products with dialogs, forms, and permission checks.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays the shopping cart, allowing item quantity updates, removal, and navigation to checkout or shop.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryPage.tsx: Fetches and shows products for a given category with loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Handles checkout flow including form validation, order creation, and success confirmation.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Shows the homepage with hero content, featured products, and admin-aware empty states.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Manages user login via Internet Identity, phone verification, form validation, and OTP flow.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Displays product details, stock info, images, and allows adding items to the cart.
frontend/src/pages/ShopPage.tsx: Lists all products with category and search filtering plus loading/error handling.
frontend/src/store/cart.ts: Implements cart state operations and persistence, including add, remove, update, clear, and subtotal/count utilities.
frontend/src/store/CartProvider.tsx: Provides a React context for cart state, syncing with storage and exposing cart operations and totals.
frontend/src/utils/authFlowErrorSanitize: Converts authentication-related errors into friendly messages by detecting common patterns and cleaning technical details.
frontend/src/utils/currency.ts: Formats numbers as INR currency strings using Intl.NumberFormat.
frontend/src/utils/productImages.ts: Maps product IDs to image filenames and builds base-path-aware URLs for product images in production.
frontend/src/utils/storefrontErrorSaniti: Sanitizes storefront errors by detecting canister, actor, replica, and backend trap errors and returning friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, including hash-route support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project version, high-level goals, architecture notes, known deployment and image-loading issues, and a list of implemented storefront features. Indicates ongoing fix requests related to product visibility, canister errors, and image rendering failures across deployments.
